name: H.U.G.E.co
description:
Disclaimer: The following game has slight references to ilegal monster and alien trafficking. 

You're a new agent tasked with the transportation of ilegal and unsafe monsters across the solar system border, these monsters tend to  be kind of hungry so don't get to worried when they eat asteroids... or cities, unlike the "Law".

Credits:

Game Design and Art: 

Lynx Kastensmidt

Programming: 

Alana Franzen - https://github.com/Ala-R-F
